name: Glory Warrior: Lord of Darkness
description:
Glory Warrior : Lord of Darkness
After centuries of peace, the world has been thrown into darkness and chaos. The dead have risen to reclaim the realm for themselves. The Lord of Darkness plans to destroy your kingdom and cast the world into an infernal apocalypse.

The dark armies have conquer and overthrown many lands with little resistance, until they attacked one village called Duan, the village of woodcutters.

Become the hero as you fight for your village and the realms which have fallen into darkness.

On your journey you will meet many characters (NPCs), they will give you advice and rewards for sorting out their problems.
You can also chat with them to disclose more information about the realms.
Many characters will carry useful equipment which can be purchased, or be rewarded to you on completion of a mini quest.
There are a wide variety of quests that await you.


Explore marshes, dark forests, and mind bending labyrinths and dungeons. Take your weapon and decimate the evil within.
Proceed deeper into the dungeons and face the guardians that block your path to the next level.
Collect loot, gold and other valuable items, as you improve your skills and experience while exploring this dark new world.


Clash with over 80 minions such as zombies, skeletons, goblins, trolls, demons and many more famous mythological creatures.
Level up your hero by using better items and collecting experience points from battles and completing quests.



*Highly detailed environments

*AAA Standard Graphics and Animation

*An Epic Storyline

*A Unique Combat Style and Game play

*Smooth and Intuitive Controls

Discover and learn how to use new combat skills. Combine those skills to create effective combos during a fight, just like a real battle.Shatter your enemies!
